title: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hey. I can seem to redeem Forecast Janna from a skin shard I received from a normal loot box. Every time I click unlock skin permanently this error appears.

replies.body: Hey-o! Well at this point you should have been able to obtain Forecast Janna. There was an issue that popped up with loot a couple times, but our awesome developers jumped on it and fixed the issue. Let me know if you're still having problems :)
